name: Realm: Before the Omniscience - 感知领域
name_original: Realm: Before the Omniscience - 感知领域
description:
这是一个带有解谜、动作与恐怖元素的Windows平台独立游戏

This is a game with puzzle, action, and horror elements for Windows. 

部分音画素材未获得商用版权，请勿将此作品用于任何商业用途，违者必究
Since we do not obtain commercial copyright for all resources, you must not use this for any commercial purposes. 

请下载游戏压缩文件（Realm-Before-the-Omniscience.zip）并解压
Please download the game ZIP file and unzip it. 

感谢游玩！
Thanks for playing!
